title: PHPgethostbyname()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPgethostbyname()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
A gethostbyname() example:
<?php
$ip = gethostbyname("www..com");
echo $ip;
?>
Definition and Usage
The gethostbyname() function returns the IPv4 address for a given domain/host name.
Syntax
gethostbyname(
hostname
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
hostname
Required. Specifies a hostname (like "www..com")
Technical Details
Return Value:
The IPv4 address on success. The hostname on failure.
PHP Version:
4.0+

★
+1
